page.title: 05Housing
page.content:
There are two main concentrations of housing in the area. In the south east there is a large amount of military housing built along one side of the Upper Heyford air base. Mainly this consists of bungalows.The housing is modern having nearly all been built within the last ten years. These houses are exclusively for the use of United States airmen and their families.
To the west of this on the side of the Oxford Canal is the smaller village of Upper Heyford.
The remainder of the area is uninhabited apart from a few scattered farmhouses.
